About

Roben C. Lunardi, Ph.D.

Associate Professor at IFRS, Brazil

  • (2020–) Associate professor at IFRS – Campus Restinga
  • (2017–21) PhD in Computer Science – Cibersecurity at PUCRS
  • (2011–20) Assistant Professor at IFRS
  • (2008–10) MSc in Computer Science – Computer Networks at UFRGS
  • (2004–08) BSc in Computer Science at UFSM

Grants

  • 2018 Australia-Americas Research Internship - Mobility Grant Award
  • IEEE/IFIP IM 2011- Student Travel Grant

Awards

  • SBSeg 2022 – Finalist of the Best Thesis Award
  • SIGCOMM 2021 – Silver prize for the undergraduate Best poster award (co–advisor)
  • ERRC 2021 – Best Paper Award
  • MOBIQUITOUS 2019 – Best Paper Award
  • ERRC 2019 – Best Paper Award
  • NOMS/DISSECT 2018 – Best Paper Award

Students and mentoring

  • Tiago, PUCRS (MS.c., exp. 2023)
  • Rodrigo, PUCRS (MS.c., exp. 2023)
  • João, IFRS (Bs.c, exp. 2023)

Collaborators

  • Prof. Avelino Francisco Zorzo (PUCRS, Brazil)
  • PhD Charles Neu (Newcastle University, UK)
  • PhD Daniel Dalalana Bertoglio (WSS Security, Brazil)
  • PhD Diego Kreutz (UNIPAMPA, Brazil)
  • PhD Weverton Cordeiro (UFRGS, Brazil)
